'''A Thank-You Letter to All Travelers''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.2]].

==Event Details==
Dear Travelers,

During our adventures, we have created countless beautiful memories together. Thanks to everyone's support, Genshin Impact has been awarded the "PlayStation® PARTNER AWARDS 2024 EXCELLENCE AWARD."

As a token of our gratitude, we will be giving away a total of Primogems &times;1000 from December 4 – December 8! Thank you for accompanying us on this journey.

===How to Claim Rewards===
[[Primogem]]s &times;200 shall be given out to Travelers via in-game mail at 00:00 (Server Time) each day from December 4 – December 8.

These Primogems can be claimed at any time before the end of Version 5.2. All Travelers who have reached Adventure Rank 7 or above can claim a total of Primogems &times;1000 via in-game mail. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.
